list.description: Auto Shoppers are working professionals between 25-44 years old and usually men. Their household income is either less than $25k or between $75-$100k.

Auto Enthusiasts are usually between 24-44 years of age, with an average household income of $25k+. They often already own a car, which they may want to trade or upgrade. This audience segment follows the news and pays attention to the latest auto-release and innovation announcements for their favourite and prospective cars.
Vehicle Owners are evenly distributed across genders, and 50% appear in the 25-34 or 35-44 age groups. This audience likely owns apps specific to their existing vehicle make and model.
DIY Auto Enthusiasts are focused on fixing, maintaining and updating their cars. They are evenly distributed across genders and most likely appear in the 35-44 year age group.
Boat Owners are evenly distributed across genders, and also evenly distributed across age groups, including 25-34, 35-44, 45-54 and 55+ ranges.
